mapper.sql:
select ui.password , mle.level_name , ui.member_level_id , mle.description , ui.phone_number , ui.user_info_id , ui.email , ui.username
FROM user_info ui left join member_level_enum mle on ui.member_level_id = mle.member_level_enum_id
mapper.select:
select ui.password , mle.level_name , ui.member_level_id , mle.description , ui.phone_number , ui.user_info_id , ui.email , ui.username
,avatar.resource_id as avatar_resource_id ,avatar.resource_name as avatar_resource_name ,avatar.resource_path as avatar_resource_path ,avatar.related_table_name as avatar_related_table_name ,avatar.related_table_key as avatar_related_table_key ,avatar.relate_table_column_name as avatar_relate_table_column_name
FROM user_info ui left join
member_level_enum
mle on ui.member_level_id = mle.member_level_enum_id
left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='user_info' and relate_table_column_name='avatar') as avatar on avatar.related_table_key=ui.user_info_id
